name: Greenkeeper.io Feedback Survey

awards.description: Three $50 amazon gift certificates will be randomly awarded to participants.

description: We investigating how developers use greenkeeper.io. Answering this survey will help researchers and tool builders create better practices and tools for dependency management.

name: Survey on Managing Software Dependencies

awards.description: Three $50 amazon gift certificates randomly awarded to participants.

description: We investigating how developers manage software dependencies (apis, libraries, packages, etc.). Answering this survey will help researchers and tool builders create better practices and tools for dependency management.

name: Research Survey on Future Alternative Programming Environments

awards.description: Two $75 gift certificates given to randomly selected participants.

description: We are trying to utilize virtual reality (VR) environments to aid in software development. Imagine a few years into the future when we can have virtual reality sunglasses that fit in our pockets. You could put on your sunglasses and instantly be immersed in a whole other environment optimized for your work. Turning your physical head to the side allows you to change your view and see more of the environment. You could pick up a virtual piece of paper off of the ground by actually moving your physical arms. We would like your help to tell us what problems could be solved using such a future virtual reality environment.

name: DevFatigue: Research on fatigue in the workplace.
